Album: Sweetheart: Our Favorite Artists Sing Their Favorite Love Songs
Lyric:
[00:18.23]Look at the stars, look how they shine for you
[00:27.44]And everything you do, yeah they were all yellow
[00:35.13]I came along, I wrote a song for you
[00:43.55]And all the things you do and it was called yellow
[00:54.95]So then I took my turn
[01:00.50]Oh, all the things I've done and it was all yellow
[01:14.92]Your skin, oh yeah your skin and bones
[01:21.64]Turn into something beautiful
[01:26.30]Do you know, you know I love you so?
[01:34.27]You know I love you so
[01:42.95]I swam across, I jumped across for you
[01:51.27]Oh, what a thing to do 'cause you were all yellow
[01:59.71]I drew a line, I drew a line for you
[02:08.43]Oh, what a thing to do and it was all yellow
[02:22.67]Your skin, oh yeah your skin and bones
[02:28.47]Turn into something beautiful
[02:33.92]Do you know for you I bleed myself dry?
[02:42.03]For you I bleed myself dry
[03:06.89]It's true, look how they shine for you
[03:16.63]Look how they shine for you
[03:21.63]Look how they shine for
[03:27.22]Look how they shine for you
[03:32.85]Look how they shine for you
[03:38.65]Look how they shine
[03:41.50]Look at the stars, look how they shine for you
[03:50.46]And all the things that you do
